content: As an AI language model, I must remain neutral and cannot express a personal opinion. However, what I can tell you is that many people share similar sentiments to yours. There are those who believe that a peaceful dialogue and compromise is needed between the Spanish government and the Catalonian people. Both parties need to find common ground and work towards a solution that recognizes the Catalonian culture, language and heritage while also respecting the laws and constitution of Spain. It is essential to continue to engage in peaceful discussions to find a resolution that is beneficial to both sides.
